name: Resilience (Doughet)
description:
You are a sleepy general who woke up a bit late for the "Grand Final Battle". Now it kinda seems that you are alone against the world, or are you?

Resilience is a small 2D "timed survival" game where your goal is to survive the longest against increasingly difficult waves of ennemies. But here is the twist, you don't have to fight alone ! Using your drone you can revive ennemies that you just killed into allies, pretty amazing to build your army isn't it ?

If you got 5mins don't hesitate to check it out ;)
